meanings.definition: Of a low temperature, especially when compared to the surrounding air.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream was the coolest treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The coolest water from the fridge was refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The coolest breeze made the summer heat more bearable.
meanings.sent4: The coolest room in the house felt like a freezer.
meanings.sent5: The coolest metal felt icy to the touch.

meanings.sent1: She wore the coolest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The coolest sneakers were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: His coolest sunglasses completed his stylish look.
meanings.sent4: The coolest hairstyle made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The coolest outfit made her feel confident and chic.

meanings.sent1: The coolest receptionist gave no smile to the visitors.
meanings.sent2: His coolest attitude made it hard to approach him.
meanings.sent3: The coolest response she received was a cold stare.
meanings.sent4: His coolest demeanor made others feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent5: The coolest behavior in the group was off-putting.
